txt.en: All in the Wrist is improved, granting additional benefits based on your current discipline.

Rohirrim: You and your allies receive a 6% evasion bonus for 6 seconds.

Riddermark: Adds an effect that increases Positional Damage by [placeholder].

Red Dawn: All in the Wrist bleed duration increased.
\nAll in the Wrist bleed duration increased when in Red Dawn.
\nYou and your allies receive a 6% evasion bonus for 6 seconds when in Rohirrim.
